alert.note: Alert for Adams; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 8:06PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN MASON, LEWIS, SOUTHERN ADAMS AND SOUTHWESTERN SCIOTO COUNTIES THROUGH 845 PM EDT... At 806 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near West Union to near Fairview, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Maysville, Manchester, Vanceburg, Lewisburg, Tollesboro, Rome, Concord, Trinity, Mays Lick, Kinniconick, Rectorville, Epworth, Ribolt, Friendship, Peed, Charters, Petersville, Stricklett, Helena and Sandy Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northern and northeastern Kentucky...and southwestern Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
